name: @imed.ch/javascript-finite-state-machine
description: A simple finite state machine library
author: Joel F Guillod - joel.guillod@gmail.com

scripts.minify: uglifyjs src/fsm.js --mangle --define DEBUG=false --comments --compress -o build/fsm.min.js && npm run minify-debug
scripts.build:
mkdir -p build && npm run minify && npm test && npm run generate-docs && echo 'Installation complete. 
In your web page use `build/fsm.min.js`. 
See docs with 
  npm run show-docs'
scripts.docs: npm run generate-docs && npm run show-docs
